xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/322269-Care Bears: Share Your Care 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zyUsxFIvWDVqqdP5JtDuTHVx6io.jpg After the Bears catch the Feeling Flu, all their usual feelings are switched -- until Harmony leads them to a cure. Then it's Share Bear to the rescue when twin sisters need help with their friendship issues, and when Funshine is overcome by fears, Grumpy inspires him by bringing happiness to a boy in need. Open up your heart and journey to Care-a-Lot for this celebration of caring and sharing! 3 Episodes - Feeling Flu, Share Squared, More Fun with Grumpy Care Bears: Share Your Care
